pullrequest.title: Both `ros_control` and `ros_controllers` are metapackages, which a normal Catkin package cannot depend on. So specific non-meta packages need to be used (originally raised in https://goo.gl/TQPui6).

content.raw: Dependency passed to `catkin_create_pkg` will appear in both `build_` and `run_` dependency (in format 1), which is overkill but won't cause any issue AFAIK, and for this tutorial that shouldn't be an issue IMO.
content.html: Dependency passed to catkin_create_pkg will appear in both build_ and run_ dependency (in format 1), which is overkill but won't cause any issue AFAIK, and for this tutorial that shouldn't be an issue IMO.
